name: The Stories of the Boys I Loved
name_original: The Stories of the Boys I Loved
description:
Made with love and sweat for the Summer Novel Festival (SuNoFes) 2022.

HOW AM I SUPPOSED TO CHOOSE BETWEEN TWO EQUALLY BEAUTIFUL SUITORS?

Hana is a 17-year-old Japanese student who's in love with her best friend, Renjiro. Yet, the fujoshi inside her awakes as she discovers his homosexuality: instead of complaining about the impossible blooming of her feelings, she decides to set him up with another boy. But little does she know that love works in mysterious ways, and that she might find unexpected love in the process.

CHARACTERS

DEMO FEATURES

- Around 1h30 of gameplay (i.e. the full prologue)
- Lovely anime art style by the extremely talented YuHeS
- Choices that influence the scenes you unlock! (yes i know for once)
- Quirky, flawed but nonetheless ✨ endearing characters ✨ (hopefully lmao don't hit me)
- BLOOD!!!!!!! (not visually tho i got your back my hematophobic folks)
- pretty colours????? (hey, i'm trying to convince you to play it????)

PLANNED FULL-GAME FEATURES

- Around 9 to 12 hours of total gameplay
- The possibility to either play Cupid, or to date bishounen boys YOURSELF!!
- Two main routes (one per love interest), each subdivided into two routes (according to either you're dating our underage Don Juans or throwing Renjiro at them)
- Eight different endings
- CGs!
- criticism of capitalism (will definitely happen)
- drAMA!!!! TEARS!! RENJIRO KILLING HANA IN A FULL YANDERE PLOT TWIST (ok this won't happen)

WARNINGS

The game is PG-13. It contains the following:
- slight cussing (although I tried to avoid it being heavy)
- mention of some teenagers' fantaisies
Some more and more spoilery trigger warnings can be found here. Please, note that this only spoils the demo content and that the main game will have many more trigger warnings; but, once again, it will always remain PG-13.

CREDITS

Writing, scripting, GUI: Yacine Aggoune
Character Art: YuHeS
Background art: good old UncleMugen, House of Imagi Studio, Clip Studio Assets assembled and edited by yours truly
Music: Dova Syndrome
Sound effects: VideoPlasty, Zapsplat

NOTES ABOUT THE WEB VERSION: This game is meant to be donwloaded and played on a computer. Playing the browser version might be laggy, and it is therefore something you should do if and only if you cannot download the executable files. Also note that the web version might not work : a change of browser usually solves the issue (I suggest Mozilla Firefox). Please, also note that the web version only features the demo: the full-game version, when it is released, will have to be downloaded.
